description: This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for the following category: Intermediate Procurement Specialist. The work must be performed remotely at the Contractor’s location. Suppliers with locations all across Canada can submit a proposal. Natural Resources Canada’s (NRCan’s) Procurement Services Unit (PSU) is seeking the services of up to four (4) Intermediate Procurement Specialist(s) to assist with procurement workload until approximately the end of the fiscal year.
full_summary:
# Intermediate Procurement Specialists
 Spanning across Canada, Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking intermediate procurement specialists to offer services as needed from government organizations.

## Request for Proposal (RFP)
An open RFP is associated with E60ZT-18TSPS and invites Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified for the Intermediate Procurement Specialist category under Tier 1.

## Proposed Work
Working remotely at contractors, NRCan’s Procurement Services Unit is in need of up to four (4) Intermediate Procurement Specialists to perform a backlog of procurement requests until fiscal year end.

## Deliverables and Objectives
The objective is to restore operational, on-demand services during the contract period, totaling twelve (12) months, including options for five (5) additional (1) year periods. This work requires expertise in managing procurement workload and supporting stakeholders in meeting operational requirements.

## Engagement Requirements

### Skills and Qualifications

* A minimum of three (3) years of procurement experience, and intermediate level skills and expertise.
* Familiarity with Canadian government procurement policies and procedures.
* Ability to perform remote work using various software applications, and have valid internet access.

### Mandatory Requirements

* A Level of Security Requirement: PROTECTED A and B.
* A Personnel Security level: RELIABILITY STATUS.

## Eligibility Criteria
To be eligible, respondents must meet the following criteria:
* Be a Supply Arrangement Holder under E60ZT-18TSPS.
* Have qualified under Tier 1 for the Intermediate Procurement Specialist category.
* Must propose a consultant with a higher level of expertise at the option of the supplier.

## Parameters and Timeline
This engagement will span across Canada and have the following parameters:

* The sought-after term is for a maximum of twelve (12) months with the potential for extension for an additional five (5) year periods.
* To be awarded through competitive, selective tendering.
* With a Level of Security Requirement: Level of information - PROTECTED A and B, and Personnel Security level - RELIABILITY STATUS.

For more information and to access the draft solicitation document, please refer to the following URLs:

* *English document*: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/15/5f9a9325da95f1f1add352834696b46c/npp_english.pdf
* *French document*: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022
